publications.name: Deep Reinforcement Learning based Super Twisting Controller for Liquid Slosh Control Problem
publications.summary: The work proposes an improvement of the already existing SOTA Super Twisting controller(a 2nd order Sliding mode controller) using Deep RL. It does so by modelling the sloshing phenomenon and numerically simulating the DRL algorithm to control sloshing during a 1-D movement of the container. This is a simulation only work which was further extended to a hardware AGV for my final year project

projects.name: RL Based Slosh Control
projects.summary: Analysed the problem of minimising slosh inside a liquid container payload on an AGV
highlights: Used DRL to tune robust Super twisting controller for minimising lateral slosh in a container to surpass SOTA
Developed a hardware AGV prototype with novel capacitive slosh measurement device
Modelled the hardware prototype and implemented STC controller on it
Trained DDPG based model free slosh controller on hardware model in simulation and fine-tuned it on hardware

Developed a server capable of collecting data from multiple patients, displaying it live on a website for remote monitoring and storing it in a database for future analysis

projects.name: Underwater ROV for inspection of Head race tunnels
projects.summary: Developed an underwater ROV for Smart India Hackathon 2020 Hardware Edition hosted by Govt. of India
highlights: Designed an underwater ROV capable of autonomous damage location, debris removal and video feedback

Developed vision-based crack detection algorithm, a tracker-based underground tunnel localization system, a P-D based depth controller using pressure sensor feedback and implemented it on a hardware prototype

projects.name: Rugby Playing robots
projects.summary: Built 2 semi-autonomous rugby playing robots for ABU Robocon 2020
highlights: Built 2 robots capable of picking, throwing, catching, placing and kicking rugby balls while communicating with each other to complete the problem statement in the fastest manner

Designed paths using quadratic spline interpolation, performed localization using sensor fusion of perpendicular encoders, perpendicular lasers and gyroscope, implemented fuzzy logic controller for path tracking
Designed dual-layer PCB for actuator control and sensor interfacing
